import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; // Ensure you have styles here function App() { const [backgroundColor, setBackgroundColor] = useState(`brown`); const radius = 350 const centerRadius = 25 const hourLen = radius * 0.5 const minLen = radius * 0.75 const borderLen = 20 const borderDiameter = borderLen + 2 * radius const handWidth = 16 const width = window.innerWidth const height = window.innerHeight return (
); } export default App;
